UPDATE_APP: Looks like you’re using an older version of the app. Update now to enjoy the latest features and improvements!
OUTDATED_APP: Your app version is outdated. Please update to keep things running smoothly.
UP_TO_DATE_APP: Great news! Your app is already up to date.
REGISTER_SUCCESS: Welcome aboard! Your account has been created successfully.
INVALID_PASSWORD: Oops! The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
PROFILE_DELETED: Your profile has been deleted successfully. We’re sad to see you go!
NOTIFICATION_ON: Notifications are now turned on. Stay tuned!
NOTIFICATION_OFF: Notifications are now turned off. You won’t be disturbed.
VALID_OLD_PASSWORD: Please enter your current password to proceed.
VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT: We’ve sent a verification code to your email. Check your inbox!
CONFIRM_MAIL: A confirmation email has been sent to your registered email address. Please check it out.
LOGGED_IN: Welcome back! You’ve logged in successfully.
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email isn’t verified yet. Please check your inbox for the verification email.
FORGET_PASSWORD_CODE_SENT: We’ve emailed you a password reset code. Check your inbox!
OTP_VERIFIED: Your verification code has been successfully verified.
PASSWORD_CHANGED: Your password has been updated successfully!
LOGGED_OUT: You’ve logged out. See you again soon!
PROFILE_UPDATED: Your profile has been updated. Looking good!
USER_BLOCKED_BY_ADMIN: This user has been blocked successfully.
USER_UNBLOCKED: This user has been unblocked successfully.
